name: Pirate's Attack
description:
It's a tower defense game, where you have to protect the king from the pirates. You have cannons, explosive barrels and barriers, and you can also upgrade your items. Try to survive and have fun!

Click on the tower (middle of island) to start upgrading your items by consuming your points. You get points by every boat you sink.

This is made for Crie seus jogos gamejam - Theme Infinity Loop
